name: Dive Journal Project
description:
Hello guys my name is Eyal and this is my first big project

Background:

In the Israeli Diving World, the dive log

(known also as Dive Journal) is a key component.

The current situation is that there is a law in Israel that

says a diver must perform a refreshing dive with

an instructor if he has not dived for the past six months.

To prove that the diver has dived for the past six months

there is a dive log.

Problem:

The problem is that the log is

physical and not online, let's say you lost the log,

all your past information is lost,

and there is no official information about the last time you dived.

Solution:

Building an app with all the information you need about your dives.

In the app, you can see your qualification level as well as the last dive date, the number of dives, and in each dive all the details of the dive (dive depth, dive duration).

You can find "Buddies" you dived with before and share them with your diving details (including photos and videos) and contact them.
